channel.description: Recent content in Framework on stultus notes

item.title: Goals-Signals-Metrics (GSM) Model
item.description: A three-step methodology for translating abstract objectives into measurable outcomes: Goals → Signals → Metrics.

item.title: HEART Framework
item.description: A user-centered methodology that measures UX quality through five key metrics: Happiness, Engagement, Adoption, Retention, and Task Success.

item.title: RACI Matrix
item.description: Responsibility assignment framework defining who is Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, and Informed.

item.title: Influencer Marketing Funnel
item.description: Four tiers of influencer marketing measurement.
